Select one of your businesses (listed under your account name) to access the Payout Settings and Channel Settings for the selected business.  
The Payout Settings screen is read-only and lists the details of the payout account(s) for the business you've selected.  
Upload an image...
merchant-admin-payout-settings.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

In addition to bank account information, the Payout Settings screen also includes the following:  
x    
Add Row Add Col
Processing Currencies 
List of supported processing currencies to be settled in the stated settlement currency and paid out to the specified bank account. 
Payment Frequency 
How often payments are made to the specified bank account. 
Increase Payment threshold to 
The payment threshold is the minimum balance required for Checkout.com to make a deposit into your bank account. The default payment threshold is typically 10x the wire fee. 
To update any of the details shown in the Payout Settings screen, please contact your Relationship Manager. 
The Channel Settings screen allows you to configure certain settings for the business channel(s) linked to the business you've selected. 
Upload an image...
merchant-admin-channel-settings.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Click the blue arrow to expand your view and reveal your API Keys.  
Upload an image...
amerchant-admin-channel-settings-expanded.png
change·remove

Click *View* to manage your URLs, Webhooks and API Keys.  
Upload an image...
merchant-admin-manage-urls.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

Click *Edit* to edit your Redirection and Redirection Fail URLs. To save your changes, click *Save*.  
Upload an image...
merchant-admin-update-urls.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Click *Manage* to configure your webhook URL. Enter your desired webhook URL and click *Save*. This will automatically generate a private shared key you can use to authenticate webhook messages sent by Checkout.com to your specified URL. You can edit your webhook URL at any time by clicking *Edit*, followed by *Save*. To refresh your private shared key, click *Refresh* and enter your login password for The Hub. Click *Submit* to confirm the refresh. * Click Test to send a test webhook to your specified address at any time. * Click Delete to delete the webhook URL from your System Admin settings. * Click OK to close the Webhook Management window.  
Upload an image...
Endpoint Edit.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Click *Refresh* to refresh your Secret Key or Public Key. You'll be prompted to enter your login password for The Hub. Click *Submit* to confirm the refresh.
